About Me

BIO

Recent Computer Science graduate with a passion for technology and software development. Eager to leverage acquired skills and knowledge to contribute to innovative projects and further professional growth. Seeking a challenging position that allows me to apply my problem-solving abilities and collaborate with a dynamic team.

Quest Globall

Full Stack Developer Intern

Built a data capture application for hospital management using HTML, CSS and Angular for the Front-end and Node.js and C sharp for the Back-end. Designed a user-friendly interface for capturing and managing patient information and medical records. Implemented data storage and retrieval using MySQL to ensure efficient data management.

Nexart

Database Manager

Managed and maintained the company website's database by accurately inputting and updating information according to company requirements, resulting in improved data accuracy. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements for database management, ensuring alignment with business needs and increasing the overall efficiency of data entry processes
